data.author: Kiezel

changelog.release_notes: Fixed issue that sometimes trial message keeps showing up

-Separate color customization for background of marks and text
-Configuration page fix for Pebble Time Round users
-Bug fix for bluetooth disconnect toggle not working

data.description:
This is a paid watch-face. You can purchase this face individually for $0.99 or purchase our entire collection of 20+ faces for $5.99. You can purchase within the settings page.

If you love our faces, give us a heart to let us know!

In dedication of the very first digital watch, the Pulsar, we completely redesigned our Digital Classic face to bring the new Pebble Health features as a primary focus. We think your watch-face should help motivate you in living a healthier life. That’s why we’ve integrated goal setting into this face. Pick your goal and focus daily on reaching your goal so you can live healthier. We also know that users love having other information on their faces, and that’s why we’ve included complications like weather, alternate timezone, date, and battery.

And as always with Kiezel faces, color presets and the ability to customize all the colors to your liking.

Enjoy!

Team Kiezel-

latest_release.release_notes: Fixed issue that sometimes trial message keeps showing up

data.title: Digital Classic 2
